name: Fasymp
description: Adventure game in the castle maze. In the game you will play as a seeker of unexplained phenomena, nicknamed Fasymp. You have to go through the labyrinths of a mysterious ancient castle and find out the secret of this strange castle. Feel free to rate the game and leave comments. The game is free, donation is optional, but if you want, I will not mind, thank you very much :) --------------------------------------------------------- Game controls: A - move left D - move right W - jump L - attack (action) mouse --------------------------------------------------------- Special thanks to all the guys who share their assets !!! Graphics: *Szadi art. Music: *VOiD1 Gaming ---------------------------------------------------------
